name: BOCO
description:
BOCO is a family friendly and easy to learn strategy game for two players. You can play games locally or online over the internet. Even though the game is meant to be played socially with your friends, we've included a basic AI to help you practice and get the hang of things.

Easy to learn yet still deep in strategy, BOCO is an excellent game for people of all ages.

When running BOCO on an Android device, we recommend a tablet, unless you have a stylus or a large screen phone.
